message: They seemed to be about a minute apart
I went to a meeting earlier and just before leaving it again posted a message to my team's private channel.
Then I got walking. I assume my connection was perhaps spotty, coming and going as I moved between wireless nodes on the way back up two floors.
(Also, sorry if there is a better place to report possible bugs)
then someone pointed out to me that I had posted that last message about 10 times.
So I assume the retry logic was adding new requests each minute?
